hadiths.text: Jabir said:"The Prophet commanded that 'Abdullah bin Ubayy by brought out of his grave, then he placed his head on his knees and blew on him and put his shirt on him." "And he prayed for him. And Allah knows best

chapter.ara-name: باب إِخْرَاجِ الْمَيِّتِ مِنَ اللَّحْدِ بَعْدَ أَنْ يُوضَعَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Bringing The Deceased Out Of The Lahd After He Has Been Placed Therein
